Js_App.title: Guess The Number
Js_App.paragraph: In this js project I created a guess the number game. every time you play there is a secret number between 1 and 20 hiden and every time you guess your score lowers by one and it displays you a message hier or lower or if you guessed the correct number then it changes the css to green and you can play again by pressing the AGAIN button. enjoy playing.

Js_App.title: Pig Game
Js_App.paragraph: In this game I created a 2 player game where 2 players are tring to reach 100 points. you start by rolling the dice if you get 1 the user changes, numbers between 2 and 6 you add to your count but only after you press on the hold button it permenntly saves your count. enjoy playing.
